Subject: To the Alliance
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"

X-Mailer: AOL 5.0 for Windows sub 138

::Chaostaur::
    He opened his eyes and through the glass top of the pod he could see that 
he was under water.  He popped the pod open and swam to the surface scanning 
the area for signs of life.  He immediately detected the Alliance base and 
sent a message to it.  "This is Chaostaur, sending a message to the base on 
the nearby island.  I am new on this world and wish to wreak havoc.  I would 
like to be pointed in the right direction.  Thank you."
